column1: Electrical and Electronic Engineering with Industrial Practice, MSc
column5: Our MSc in Electrical and Electronic Engineering with Industrial Practice is ideal for forward-thinking graduates seeking career development in manufacturing or engineering management.This master's programme helps to develop graduates into innovative professional engineers with a creative approach to problem-solving and a focus on efficient utilisation of current and emerging technologies. It will suit engineering and technology graduates who want to expand their skills or develop professional careers in electrical and electronic engineering related fields.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
